text: Mucajaí () is a municipality located in the midwest of the state of Roraima in Brazil. Its population is 16,380 (2015) and its area is 12,461 km². The municipality contains part of the Roraima National Forest. In 2018, protests were held in the city advocating for local social, economic, firemen and police reforms. ==References== Category:Municipalities in Roraima
title: Mucajaí
